attributes.action: convicted child molesters get life in prison and drug dealers get less sentence
attributes.additional_details: because the system is broken how does it make sense a convicted child molester gets 10 years and a drug dealer gets life it makes no sense. Molesters are impacting and scaring people not to their consent drug dealers are giving drugs at peoples consent no
attributes.background: I want you to stop convicting child molesters to 10 years in prison and give them life instead of giving drug dealers life in prison and not 10 years

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Longer sentences for child sex offenders, sex offenders and rapists: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/323338

Increase minimum and maximum sentences for all crimes against children: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/467154

Impose mandatory 10-year custodial sentences for all child sexual abuse offences: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556664

We could accept a petition calling for minimum and maximum sentences for drug-related offences to be reduced, if you would also like a petition about that.
